tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_brand_environmental_impact (
    brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturing_process TEXT,
    carbon_footprint DECIMAL,
    water_usage DECIMAL,
    waste_generation DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE fashion_brands (
  brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand_name VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturing_process VARCHAR(100),
  sustainability_goals VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  brand_id INT,
  emission_levels VARCHAR(50),
  water_usage VARCHAR(50),
  waste_generation VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES fashion_brands(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE brand (
	brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	brand_name TEXT,
	country TEXT,
	website TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE product (
	product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	product_name TEXT,
	price DECIMAL,
	material TEXT,
	brand_id INT REFERENCES brand(brand_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sustainability_goals (
	goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	goal_description TEXT,
	progress INT,
	brand_id INT REFERENCES brand(brand_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Product (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    brand_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10,2),
    category VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES Brand(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Manufacturing_Process (
    process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Product(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    brand_id INT NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES Brand(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductManufacturing (
    product_id INT,
    process_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES Product(product_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (process_id) REFERENCES ManufacturingProcess(process_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SustainabilityGoals (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT NOT NULL,
    carbon_emission_goal DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    energy_consumption_goal DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES Brand(brand_id)
);
